snippet: The company can, however, use a variation on the title by adding the name of the director.
abstract: Film industry’s Title Registration Bureau upholds earlier ruling that Weinstein Company was violating bureau rules by calling upcoming film The Butler, since Warner Brothers owns short film by that name; bureau says that Weinstein may use a variation on title by adding name of the director, Lee Daniels.
lead_paragraph: The company can, however, use a variation on the title by adding the name of the director.

headline.main: Weinstein Company Loses Appeal to Use Movie Title ‘The Butler’
